Government Tender Announcement
***

**Project Title and Reference**
***********

- **English Title:** Humidification System Upgrade at the Joseph A. Ghiz Building in Summerside, PEI
- **French Title:** Mise à niveau du système d'humidification à l'immeuble Joseph A. Ghiz à Summerside, Î.-P.-É.
- **Reference Number:** WS4382887819-Doc4382906493

**Tender Information**
*******************

- **Solicitation Number:** WS4382887819 (Expired)
- **County Region:** Prince Edward Island
- **Contact Information:** Rachel Miller, pişę sppää ges CAD fp (`elle-la/her`) at [rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified firms to design and install a new humidification system and remove the existing steam boiler at the Joseph A. Ghiz Building in Summerside, Prince Edward Island. This procurement falls under the Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services Group.

**Eligible Firms**
------------------

The following firms have been invited to bid:

- Coles and Associates
- Strum Engineering Associates Ltd.
- Roy Consultants
- Dillon Consulting Limited

These firms have previously qualified under the Mechanical discipline in Prince Edward Island, and PSPC wishes to select a firm for this project based on their technical merit and price.

**Submission Instructions**
-------------------------

Proposal submissions must be made in either English or French, and may be sent via email or mail to the address listed below. The solicitation document provides additional details on proposal submission requirements, evaluation criteria, and deadlines.

**Project Overview**

- **Project Start Date:** January 31, 2024
- **Project Expiry Date:** TBC

**Procurement Conditions**

This project is part of a PSU arrangement with PST suppliers and may be subject to applicable domestic laws and regulations in Canada. The proposed contract duration commences following subcontracting entity negotiation. Please consult the PST document for any updates to such provisions.

**Submission of Proposals**
-------------------------

Proposals are due by January 24, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. Atlantic Standard Time (NST). Subsequent questions and clarification requests must be submitted at least 72 hours before the proposal submission date. Debriefings will be offered on a request basis for all unsuccessful bids. Request for a debrief
